page.title: 10ATTITUDES OF FORD PEOPLE
page.content: It seems that{FORD}is a much loved village by all of the people living there, especially the old people.Those who have lived there all their life like{FORD}as it is,with one village shop and a nice church.But the younger people would like to see supermarkets introduced into{FORD.}Some people would like to see the{LEASOWES}with better houses and the Recreation ground replaced with better equipment e.g. swings,slides and roundabouts.The old people would like to see more street lighting.The mobile library is used a lot by the old people and they would like a speed limit through the village and the junction with the{A458 adjusted to make easier access to and from{FORD.}
